enum.name: ContextualCueingNudgeDecision

int.label: Unknown
Success

enum.int: Success in determining a nudge for the page. It is not guaranteed that the nudge was shown to the user.

int.label: Server data unavailable

enum.int: The server did not have data for this page.

int.label: Server data malformed

enum.int: The server had data for the page but it was malformed.

int.label: Client conditions unmet

enum.int: The server had data for the page but the client conditions to show the nudge were unmet.

int.label: Not enough page loads since last nudge

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but not enough page loads have been navigated to since the last nudge shown to the user.

int.label: Not enough time has elapsed since last nudge dismissal

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but not enough time has elapsed since the last nudge shown to the user after an explicit dismissal.

int.label: Too many nudges shown to the user

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but too many nudges have been shown to the user recently.

int.label: Too many nudges shown to the user, for the domain

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but too many nudges have been shown to the user recently for the domain.

int.label: The Nudge was not shown as IPH was alraedy being Shown

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but the user was currently being presented the IPH.

int.label: The nudge was not shown as the user already has the feature window open

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but the user already has the feature window open.

int.label: User closes the tab/window as a nudge decision is being computed

enum.int: User closes the tab/window as a nudge decision is being computed.

int.label: Not enough time has elapsed since last time nudge was shown

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but not enough time has elapsed since the last nudge shown to the user.

int.label: The nudge was not shown as the user has another window level call to action UI shown in this window.

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but the user already has a window modal UI showing.

int.label: The nudge was not shown as the user already has the feature side panel open in the tab

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but the user already has the feature side panel open in the tab.

int.label: The nudge was not shown as the browser actor was active on the tab

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but the browser actor is currently active on the tab.

int.label: The nudge was not shown as the contextual tasks side panel was open for the tab

enum.int: The page was eligible for the nudge, but the contextual tasks side panel was open for the tab.

enum.name: ContextualCueingNudgeInteraction

int.label: Unknown
Shown

enum.int: The server sent data and we successfully showed the nudge.

int.label: Not Shown due to wrong webcontents

enum.int: The server sent data, but for a different web contents so we did not nudge.

int.label: Clicked

enum.int: The user clicked on a shown nudge.

int.label: Dismissed

enum.int: The user dismissed the nudge with the close button.

int.label: Closed via new tab

enum.int: The nudge was dismissed by the tab changing.

int.label: Closed via new navigation

enum.int: The nudge was dismissed by the navigation changing.

int.label: Not Shown due to existing call to action in window

enum.int: The server sent data, but another window level call to action UI was already shown.">

int.label: Closed due to contextual tasks side panel opening

enum.int: The nudge was dismissed by the contextual tasks side panel opening.

enum.name: ContextualCueingZeroStateSuggestionsPageContextIneligibilityType

int.label: None
Optimization Metadata

enum.int: The optimization metadata returned for the page (or all pages, if a pinned tabs request) deemed the request ineligible.

int.label: Page context

enum.int: The page context fetched for the page (or all pages, if a pinned tabs request) was invalid.
